meanings.definition: A substance, typically liquid or gas, used to reduce the temperature of a system by transferring heat away from it.
meanings.sent1: The mechanic poured coolant into the car's radiator to keep the engine from overheating.
meanings.sent2: Make sure to check the coolant level in your car regularly to prevent any damage.
meanings.sent3: The coolant in the fridge works hard to keep our food fresh and cool.
meanings.sent4: Her calm demeanor acted as a coolant in the heated argument, diffusing the tension.
meanings.sent5: The coolant flowed smoothly through the pipes, carrying the excess heat away.
